column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went here for my birthday dinner in August
column2: and I loved it. I heard high praise about this place from my coworker and other friends
column3: and it had been on my list for a long time. The bacon-wrapped dates were as amazing as others have said
column5: probably the best things I had all night. I don't think I found any of the tapas disappointing
column6: and the octopus was also really really good. The seared scallops were also great. I love how many options they have
column7: and I wish I could remember every single thing I ate.
